parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

employStartDate.description: Starting date of the customer's employment.

employerBusiness.description: The business of customer's employer involved.

salaryFrequency.description: Indicates the payment frequency of salary.

netMonthlyIncome.description: Net income earned by customer each month.

netMonthlyExpense.description: Net expenses of customer each month.

employerAddress.description: The address of the customer's employer.

residenceType.description: Residence type of the customer.Type should be one of Farmhouse, Independent house, Residential Apartment, Serviced Apartments

residenceSince.description: The date since the user has obtained the residence.

communicationDevice.description: communication devices used by the customer.

communicationType.description: Communication type to the customer.Type should be one of Proposals, Alert, Compaign, New Product Update,Robinsons List, Statements.

preferredChannel.description: Preferred method of contact to the customer.

customerName.description: The name that is displayed for the customer

isSecureMessage.description: To identify whether the customer will receive a SECURE message or not.

isInternetBankingService.description: Indicates whether is Customer is subscribed to the internet banking service or not.

isMobileBankingService.description: Indicates whether is Customer is subscribed to the mobile banking service or not.

customerVisitCount.description: Count of the Number of visits to the bank.

customerRecentVisitDate.description: Recently visited date of the customer to the bank.

customerLiability.description: Indicates the customer consolidation number for credit grouping purposes,within the same branch/country.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
